TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
What can I say but

"Hot damn I love wigglin'!"

I wish for something mundane, yet pleasing.

On 15.07.2017 at 2:09 PM, 0111narwhalz said:

I wish for something mundane, yet pleasing.

You drink eight bottles of cola.
Then visit WC..

I wish Mowgli hadn't put so much pepper in his gift for Kaa.

Spoiler

granted but he puts it in a gift for you instead

I wish apple would sell itself to microsoft

Edited July 17, 2017 by LJITimate

Granted. All iDevices worldwide now have to proceed thru MS's upgrade path, starting with Windows 3.11

 

I wish for a knish.

Edited July 17, 2017 by Xorth Tanovar

Granted, but they're filled with human organs and copies of The Room.

I wish for a D20 that always rolls a natural 20.

Granted. Game Master bans you for cheating.

I wish for a pair of tesseract dice.

They are actually 4-D, thus melting your perception thru incomprehension.

I wish for a good outcome.

granted but its only good for someone else

I wish I had the force

Granted, but it's the force of gravity and nothing much has changed.
Since, you know, you already have that force.

I wish for a heisenbug.

Yeah, but Heisenberg's uncertainty principle will make the Hesienbug appear anywhere. (Like your BRAIN MWA HA HA HA!)

I wish to fly to the ISS 

Edited July 18, 2017 by DunaManiac

granted but you fly it into the sun

I wish content didn't have to be approved by a moderator an hour after I post it
Granted, but then somebody else will have to approve it. I wish for peace on Earth

Granted. Humanity leaves the Earth and moves to Mars.

I wish Under The Dome series were about lunar colony,

Granted, it's a lame reality show now. 

I wich I was the leader of Earth!

Granted,
You have the Earth and a lot of lead, and must begin covering the Earth with lead.
You are the Earth leader.

I wish (just 4lulz) next time they remake to female "Agent 007" movies.

Edited July 18, 2017 by kerbiloid

Granted, but it's starring Temmie.

I wish Superman's laser vision was of the same nature as his x-ray vision; i.e. he can see lasers.

Granted. He can. But as a laser beam is very pointy, he can see laser beams only when they directly hit his eye.

I wish Jean Grey / Phoenix from X-Men had realized that she could just cast mass enuresis and reached her aims with much less efforts.

Granted. I don't know who she is. But she seems worse already!

I wish that Squad added more parts to KSP.

Edited July 25, 2017 by Tux1

Granted. They add a complete (> 30 000) historical set of parts for A-4 (aka V-2).
Now you have to wait for two weeks while KSP is loading.

I wish they indeed had done that.

Granted. The parts that are added is small useless fins and rockets that have like 1 thrust.

 

I wish I could actually get to the Mun and back!

Edited August 2, 2017 by Program Kerbal Space

Granted! You're now short, green, and have a big cylinder shaped head. You were conscripted for a Mun mission, with a return capsule not equipped with a heatshield.

i wish for the historical pack to be awesome, and released during my lifetime.

Edited August 2, 2017 by Overfloater

Granted, But when it does you are so old you can't even play KSP 

I wish that I could  fly to saturn

Granted. You have everything you need to survive, but it's a Hohmann transfer and free return to Earth, so no landing on the moons, and you're alone on the ship.

I wish spiders could speak, and had their own languages.

Granted. But the only thing they say, are harsh words when they get squashed with a slipper.

I wish mantises, wasps and dragonflies eradicate all spiders and replace them in the ecosystem.

5 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

wasps

NO JUST ABSOLUTELY NOT WASPS ARE BAD.

granted

you get stung by wasps for the rest of time

I wish for a wish that could wish for a wish (1m years later) that could wish for a wish
